# faucet.prim.sh

Testnet faucet for Base Sepolia. Dispenses free USDC and ETH to wallet
addresses for testing prim primitives. No auth or payment required.
Rate-limited by wallet address.

Base URL: https://faucet.prim.sh
Auth: None (free, rate-limited by address). Wallet must be on allowlist during beta.
Network: Base Sepolia (eip155:84532) only. Returns 403 on mainnet.

Install:
  curl -fsSL https://faucet.prim.sh/install.sh | sh

Drip amounts:
  USDC: 10 USDC per drip. Cooldown: 2 hours.
  ETH:  0.01 ETH per drip. Cooldown: 1 hour.

USDC source: Circle Faucet API, with treasury wallet ERC-20 transfer fallback.
ETH source:  Treasury wallet.

---

## Error envelope

  {"error": {"code": "<code>", "message": "<msg>", "retryAfter": <seconds>}}

retryAfter is present only on 429 responses.

---

## Endpoints

### GET /

Health check. Returns network info. Always responds (no testnet guard).

Free.

Response (200):
  service  string   "faucet.sh"
  status   string   "ok"
  network  string   CAIP-2 chain identifier (e.g. "eip155:84532")
  testnet  boolean  Whether configured for testnet

---

### GET /pricing

Machine-readable pricing for all endpoints.

Free.

Response (200):
  service   string  "faucet.prim.sh"
  currency  string  "USDC"
  network   string  "eip155:8453"
  routes    array   Route pricing list (all $0.00 — faucet is free)
    .method       string  HTTP method
    .path         string  URL path
    .price_usdc   string  Price in USDC (always "0")
    .description  string  Human-readable description

---

### GET /v1/metrics

Operational metrics. Uptime, request counts, latency percentiles, error rates.

Free.

Response (200):
  service     string  "faucet.prim.sh"
  uptime_s    number  Seconds since last restart
  requests    object  Request counts and latencies by endpoint
  payments    object  Payment counts by endpoint
  errors      object  Error counts by status code

---

### POST /v1/faucet/usdc

Dispense 10 test USDC on Base Sepolia.

Free. Rate limit: once per 2 hours per address.

Request:
  address  string  required  EVM wallet address (0x... 42 chars)

Response (200):
  txHash    string  Transaction hash on Base Sepolia. May be "pending" if Circle
                    returns 204 with no tx hash.
  amount    string  Amount dispensed (e.g. "10.00")
  currency  string  "USDC"
  chain     string  CAIP-2 chain identifier (e.g. "eip155:84532")
  source    string  "circle" | "treasury" — which backend dispensed the USDC

Errors:
  400  invalid_request     Missing or invalid address
  403  wallet_not_allowed  Wallet not on allowlist (private beta)
  403  mainnet_rejected    Faucet only operates on testnet
  429  rate_limited        Address already dripped within 2 hours. retryAfter: seconds to wait.
  502  faucet_error        Both Circle and treasury fallback failed

---

### POST /v1/faucet/eth

Dispense 0.01 test ETH on Base Sepolia.

Free. Rate limit: once per 1 hour per address.

Request:
  address  string  required  EVM wallet address (0x... 42 chars)

Response (200):
  txHash    string  Transaction hash on Base Sepolia
  amount    string  Amount dispensed (e.g. "0.01")
  currency  string  "ETH"
  chain     string  CAIP-2 chain identifier (e.g. "eip155:84532")

Errors:
  400  invalid_request     Missing or invalid address
  403  wallet_not_allowed  Wallet not on allowlist (private beta)
  403  mainnet_rejected    Faucet only operates on testnet
  429  rate_limited        Address already dripped within 1 hour. retryAfter: seconds to wait.
  502  faucet_error        Treasury wallet failed to send ETH

---

### GET /v1/faucet/status

Check rate limit status for a wallet address across both faucets.
Call this before dripping to avoid 429s.

Free.

Query params:
  address  string  required  EVM wallet address

Response (200):
  address  string  The queried address
  usdc     object  USDC faucet availability
    .available     boolean  Whether USDC faucet can be called right now
    .retryAfterMs  integer  Milliseconds until rate limit resets. 0 if available.
  eth      object  ETH faucet availability
    .available     boolean  Whether ETH faucet can be called right now
    .retryAfterMs  integer  Milliseconds until rate limit resets. 0 if available.

Errors:
  400  invalid_request  Missing or invalid address query param
